Articles.Content:
Every time I try to launch a vehicle, I see my spacecraft for around 3 seconds, and then everything goes black. It happens right as the crew windows go from static to showing the crew. Any help?

Hows your 1.0 experience so far?

> 
> Every time I try to launch a vehicle, I see my spacecraft for around 3 seconds, and then everything goes black. It happens right as the crew windows go from static to showing the crew. Any help?
> Hows your 1.0 experience so far?

Everything? Like, the screen and the NavBall and the altimeter looks odd? That's the Hell Kraken. Restarting the game might help, and if not, reinstalling would probably do it. I had this happen a while ago.

Did it look like this?

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/su-mH2a_gm8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

This is the result I got on a PC with Windows 7 64-bit. Tried different resolutions: the result is the same everytime.

(On a Windows 7.1 64-bit, two addons: Kerbal Alarm Clock 3.2.2.0 and Lazor Docking Camera (last version))

- - - Updated - - -

Tried it once more, without addons. Same result. This should be in unmodded installs then actually.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T18:56:31Z" title="04/28/2015 06:56  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by BaryonicMan**
Update: I completely reinstalled and now I no longer have these black screens.
